sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"特殊的，特别的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: special, especial, specific, particular, exceptional, extraordinary, peculiar
means: special ： 普通用词，指不同于一般、与众不同，着重事物的专门性，突出与一般不同。
especial和special含义很接近，较正式，但侧重有特殊的意义或重要性。
specific ： 着重指某种、某类事物具有的特殊或特定的属性，也可指专门提出作特别考虑的事物。
particular ： 侧重不同于普遍性的个性或特殊性。
exceptional ： 指不同于一般，本身是特别的或异常的事物。
extraordinary ： 语气比exceptional强，指极大地超过一般或正常情况。
peculiar ： 强调指与众不同或独特的意思。

sentence.Network_en: A special locking system means the door cannot be opened accidentally.
sentence.Network_cn: 特殊的锁定系统使门不会被意外打开。

sentence.Network_en: His immediate superior has singled him out for a special mention.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的顶头上司特别提到了他。

sentence.Network_en: Her cousin, a hairdresser, was perming her hair as a special treat.
sentence.Network_cn: 她表兄是美发师，正在免费给她烫发。

jx.jx_en_mean: short for on special offer (see offer)

means.word_mean: 特别的;专门的
其他释义
特别的;具体的;专用的
其他释义

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: shortening of Old French especial 'especial' or Latin specialis, from species 'appearance' (see species)

encyclopedia.content: 基本介绍 丝柏舍（special）为烟台拓森服装有限公司旗下知名时尚女装品牌。 丝柏舍女装致力“凸显女性个性之美”，集鲜明的个性设计、精致的限量生产、独特的线上线下销售三位一体，志在通过设计师独特的设计品位和中间经销环节的删减，让每位爱美女性均能享受到属于自己的那份特别的美丽。 公司渊源 拓森服装为某高校连续三届爱心社负责人合伙创建，三人在校期间志同道合，前赴后继致力于爱心的奉献、传递、呼唤，对真善美不断孜

entry.def: Someone or something that is special is better or more important than other people or things.

example.ex: You're very special to me, darling...
example.tran: 亲爱的，你对我来说很重要。

example.ex: There are strong arguments for holidays at Easter and Christmas because these are special occasions...
example.tran: 支持复活节和圣诞节放假是有充分论据的，因为这些节日都是特殊的时刻。

example.ex: In special cases, a husband can deduct the travel expenses of his wife who accompanies him on a business trip...
example.tran: 在特殊情况下，丈夫可以扣除陪同出差的妻子的旅费。

example.ex: So you didn't notice anything special about him?...
example.tran: 这么说你并没有发现他有什么异常之处了？

entry.def: You use special to describe someone who is officially appointed or who has a particular position specially created for them.

example.ex: Due to his wife's  illness, he returned to the State Department as special adviser to the President...
example.tran: 由于妻子生病，他回到了国务院，出任总统的特别顾问。

example.ex: Frank Deford is a special correspondent for Newsweek magazine.
example.tran: 弗兰克·德福特是《新闻周刊》杂志的特派记者。

entry.tran: (为残疾人或有心理障碍者)特设的，专门的
entry.def: Special institutions are for people who have serious physical or mental problems.

example.ex: Police are still searching for a convicted rapist, who escaped from Broadmoor special hospital yesterday.
example.tran: 警方仍然在搜寻昨天从布罗德莫尔专科医院逃跑的一名强奸犯。

entry.def: You use special to describe something that relates to one particular person, group, or place.

example.ex: Every anxious person will have his or her own special problems or fears.
example.tran: 每一个焦虑的人都会有自己的问题或者担心。

example.ex: ...it requires a very special brand of courage to fight dictators.
example.tran: 与独裁者作斗争需要非同寻常的勇气。

entry.def: A special is a product, programme, or meal which is not normally available, or which is made for a particular purpose.

example.tran: 对英国广播公司的万圣节特别节目《幽灵观察》的投诉

example.ex: Grocery stores have to offer enough specials to bring people into the store.
example.tran: 杂货店为了招揽顾客不得不推出多种特色产品。

means.word_mean: 1. a special offering (usually temporary and at a reduced price) that is featured in advertising;

sentences.sentence: "they are having a special on pork chops"

means.word_mean: 2. a dish or meal given prominence in e.g. a restaurant
3. a television production that features a particular person or work or topic;

sentences.sentence: "the last of a series of BBC specials on Iran is being shown tonight"

means.word_mean: 1. unique or specific to a person or thing or category;

sentences.sentence: "has a paraticular preference for Chinese art"
"a peculiar bond of sympathy between them"

means.word_mean: 2. for a special service or occasion;

sentences.sentence: "had to get special permission for the event"

means.word_mean: 3. surpassing what is common or usual or expected;

sentences.sentence: "a matter of particular and unusual importance"
"a special reason to confide in her"

means.word_mean: 4. adapted to or reserved for a particular purpose;
5. having a specific function or scope;

sentences.sentence: "a special (or specific) role in the mission"

means.word_mean: 6. first and most important;

sentences.sentence: "she gets special (or particular) satisfaction from her volunteer work"

means.word_mean: 7. added to a regular schedule;

sentences.sentence: "put on special buses for the big game"

auth_sentence.content: Our special programmes will be on air in spring.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our special programmes will be on air in spring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our special programmes will be on air in spring.

auth_sentence.content: They're both special players in their own ways.
auth_sentence.res_content: They're both special players in their own ways.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They're both special players in their own ways.

auth_sentence.content: But Special Delivery has always looked beyond the Caribbean.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Special Delivery has always looked beyond the Caribbean.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Special Delivery has always looked beyond the Caribbean.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+specific特有的→共同特有的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+al……的→adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+fic→具体的,特有的
e+special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]→adj.特别的, 特殊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 似是而非的,华而不实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ous……的→外观相似而实质不同
especial[adj.特别的, 特殊的]+ly表副词→adv.特别, 尤其
special特殊的,专门的+ist专家或人→n.专门医师, 专家
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ity表名词→n.[specialty]特性,性质;专业/长;特产
speci外观,种类,特别+es表复数→[所有]种类
specific[adj.明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的]+ation表名词→n.详述;[常n.]规格,说明书,规范
speci外观,种类,特别+men表物品→n.标本,样本
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ize化→v.[specialise][in]专攻,专门研究,专业化

stems_affixes.value_cn: 指定, 详细说明, 列入清单
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ify表动词→specify规类→指定, 列入清单

Sentence.sentence: Very special books are still occasionally produced on vellum, but they are one-of-a-kind show pieces.
The other measures include restricting portion sizes, taxing and prohibiting special price deals for junk foods, and placing warning labels on the products.
But inside, special windows cut power bills by blocking solar heat in summer and retaining indoor warmth in winter
Let us hope these do not include banning gender pronouns,policing children's play, implementing more gender quotas, or treating women's special attachment to home and family as a social injustice.
But it is natural to desire to do so for special occasions
Harvard has a special opportunity to convey its respect for science not only through its research and teaching programs but also in its public affirmation of evidence-based inquiry.

means.word_mean: 特殊的, 特别的

sentences.en: The best students are awarded special scholarships.
sentences.cn: 最好的学生将授予特殊奖学金。

means.word_mean: 专门的, 特设的

sentences.en: He is making a special study of modern French literature.
sentences.cn: 他专门研究当代法国文学。

means.word_mean: 特别亲密的; 格外的

sentences.en: He's a special friend of mine.

means.word_mean: 特别的事物

sentences.en: The train was a special for the football game.
sentences.cn: 那班火车是为足球赛开的专车。

means.word_mean: 特价

sentences.en: Ice cream is on special this week only!
sentences.cn: 冰淇淋特价优惠, 只限本周！

means.word_mean: (医务人员)不间断地特别护理

jushi.english: The hospital has over fifty special diets for different kinds of illness.
jushi.chinese: 这家医院对各种不同的疾病备有50种专门食谱。

jushi.english: Take special care tonight because the roads are icy.
jushi.chinese: 路面结冰了,今晚要格外小心。

jushi.english: This is a special case deserving special treatment.
jushi.chinese: 这里有个特殊情况需要特殊处理。
